Action.author: manish-sethi
Action.body: Not in the scope of Fabric peer. ~KevinXiong1977 if you want to propose a static code analysis based approach, that's a much bigger effort and orthogonal effort and hyperledger lab|https://www.hyperledger.org/blog/2018/01/23/introducing-hyperledger-labs is a forum for incubating such stuff.
